text: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

An alien battle happened within our district this morning, it was a small group of them, and we had expected them to come first in the afternoon. I hid under our town's bunker together with the other commoners. Right during the battle, a commoner noticed my back glowing a bright light and my hair was floating around.

We won the battle and surprisingly no Chosen or healers got killed. In fact, no one got hurt during the battle. They said it was me. Although they did not call me a Chosen. They called me, "The Savior".
